title: Embroidered Panel, 1900–65
medium:
Medium: cotton, mother-of-pearl
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Cotton panel with alternating bands of red and black. Embroidered in red, yellow, and green zigzag pattern. Small tear-shaped pieces of mother-of-pearl sewn to panel at intervals in horizontal rows. Panel edged at both sides with brocaded borders in yellow, red, and black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Panel, 1900–65.
1900–65. Medium: cotton, mother-of-pearl
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of Mrs. Calvin Stillman. 1965-24-16.
